tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE market_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    exchange_name VARCHAR(255),
    asset_pair VARCHAR(255),
    trade_type VARCHAR(50),
    trade_price DECIMAL(18, 6),
    trade_volume DECIMAL(18, 6),
    trade_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE market_data (
   id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   exchange_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   token_pair VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   last_price DECIMAL(20, 8) NOT NULL,
   volume DECIMAL(20, 8) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE market_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol TEXT,
    market_name TEXT,
    last_price DECIMAL,
    volume DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE historical_price (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol TEXT,
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL,
    high_price DECIMAL,
    low_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE exchange_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    exchange_name TEXT,
    trading_pair TEXT,
    trade_volume DECIMAL,
    price DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_activity (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    action TEXT,
    details TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE market_data (
    market_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    token_name VARCHAR(50),
    token_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    last_price DECIMAL(18, 8),
    volume DECIMAL(18, 8)
);

CREATE TABLE decentralized_exchanges (
    exchange_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    exchange_name VARCHAR(50),
    tokens_supported VARCHAR(255),
    total_volume DECIMAL(18, 8),
    trade_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_activity (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    last_login TIMESTAMP,
    total_trades INT,
    total_earned DECIMAL(18, 8)
);

CREATE TABLE liquidity_pools (
    pool_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tokens_pair VARCHAR(100),
    reserve_1 DECIMAL(18, 8),
    reserve_2 DECIMAL(18, 8),
    total_liquidity DECIMAL(18, 8)
);
